article: the build-up for the blockbuster fight between floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao in las vegas on may 2 steps up a gear on tuesday night when the american holds an open workout for the media .
the session will be streamed live across the world and you can watch it here from 12 am uk -lrb- 7 pm edt -rrb- .
abstract: floyd mayweather holds an open media workout from 12 am uk -lrb- 7 pm edt -rrb- .
the american takes on manny pacquiao in las vegas on may 2 .
mayweather 's training is being streamed live across the world .
